name: lince-fragrances-mern-stack
description: As a practical challenge proposed by the technology company Lince Net I developed this project which is basically a small ecommerce developed with Node.js on the backend and ReactJS on the frontend where it is possible for the user to create their account and select the desired items in the product list and make your purchase.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
